objects.text: SEPARATE SHOE COMPARTMENT • 3 STORAGE SECTIONS • VERSATILE CARRY OPTIONS

product_details.name: Foldie Travel Bag Expandable, Gym Bag with Shoe Compartment, Workout Bags for Gym with Straps Personal Item Travel Bag for Weekender Overnight, Duffel Bags for Traveling(Gray)
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 17.72 x 7.87 x 13 inches. Item Weight: 1.87 pounds. Department: Unisex. Country of Origin: China. Number of Compartments: 3.

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern product layout for a travel duffel, prominently displaying a main product image at the center with supporting images. The backdrop is styled with a dark diagonal gradient, featuring soft geometric grid lines and faded white circular overlays for depth. The main title (layer: heading) is large and bold, grabbing attention, while a secondary subtitle (layer: subheading) in futuristic light blue font adds description. Below the product, a concise feature list (layer: description) in white text provides utility highlights. The bold price tag (layer: price) is placed centrally on a transparent gradient section, followed by a clear call-to-action button (layers: cta_button, cta) in vibrant green.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #2C3E50  
- Cool Slate: #4B6584  
- Accent Blue: #3498DB  
- Mint Green: #1ABC9C  
- Light Blue Text: #A3D1FF  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a sleek gym/travel bag primarily in shades of grey, giving it a modern, minimalist appearance. The main body is a light steel grey (#B0B5BC), contrasted by darker charcoal grey straps and accents (#4A4F54). These tones are well-balanced, offering visual depth without the need for bright colors. The brand logo is subtly embossed in a muted slate hue (#5A5F66), maintaining the professional and refined aesthetic. The white shoes peeking from the compartment (#FFFFFF) add a clean contrast and help draw attention to the utility feature. These harmonized greys create a professional, gender-neutral palette ideal for an advertisement banner.
